languages.text: "Будь я законнорожденным ребенком — да, меня вписали бы золотыми чернилами в летопись династии. Но происхождение моей матери и другие обстоятельства бросали тень на фон Валанциусов, поэтому мое включение в семью прошло совсем не гладко".

"Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."
languages.original_text: "Будь я законнорожденным ребенком — да, меня вписали бы золотыми чернилами в летопись династии. Но происхождение моей матери и другие обстоятельства бросали тень на фон Валанциусов, поэтому мое включение в семью прошло совсем не гладко".

traits.locale_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

"Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

languages.text: «De haber sido un hijo legítimo, sí, habrían escrito mi nombre en oro en la crónica de la dinastía. Sin embargo, tanto el origen de mi madre como otras circunstancias resultaban incómodas para la casa von Valancius, de modo que mi inclusión en la familia quedó paralizada».
languages.original_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

traits.locale_text: «De haber sido un hijo legítimo, sí, habrían escrito mi nombre en oro en la crónica de la dinastía. Sin embargo, tanto el origen de mi madre como otras circunstancias resultaban incómodas para la casa von Valancius, de modo que mi inclusión en la familia quedó paralizada».

languages.text: “如果我是王朝合法的子嗣，那确实如此。所有人都会用金色的颜料，把我的名字写进王朝的编年史。但遗憾的是，我母亲的出身以及某些其他状况会对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝不利，因此我融入家族的过程也并不顺利。”
languages.original_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

traits.locale_text: “如果我是王朝合法的子嗣，那确实如此。所有人都会用金色的颜料，把我的名字写进王朝的编年史。但遗憾的是，我母亲的出身以及某些其他状况会对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝不利，因此我融入家族的过程也并不顺利。”

languages.text: 「私が正統な子どもだったかということか―そうだ。彼らは私の名前を王朝の年代記の中に金で書き付けた。しかし、私の母の出生やある他の状況がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の傷となったため、私を家系に含めることは思わぬ暗礁に乗り上げた」
languages.original_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

traits.locale_text: 「私が正統な子どもだったかということか―そうだ。彼らは私の名前を王朝の年代記の中に金で書き付けた。しかし、私の母の出生やある他の状況がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の傷となったため、私を家系に含めることは思わぬ暗礁に乗り上げた」

languages.text: "Wäre ich ein legitimes Kind gewesen ... ja, dann hätten sie meinen Namen in goldenen Lettern in die Chronik der Dynastie geschrieben. Allerdings waren die Herkunft meiner Mutter und gewisse andere Umstände für Haus von Valancius abträglich, was wiederum meine Aufnahme in die Familie erschwerte.
languages.original_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre ich ein legitimes Kind gewesen ... ja, dann hätten sie meinen Namen in goldenen Lettern in die Chronik der Dynastie geschrieben. Allerdings waren die Herkunft meiner Mutter und gewisse andere Umstände für Haus von Valancius abträglich, was wiederum meine Aufnahme in die Familie erschwerte.

languages.text: « Si j'avais été un enfant légitime, alors oui, on aurait placardé mon nom en lettres d'or dans les chroniques de la dynastie. Cependant, l'origine de ma mère, entre autres circonstances, aurait terni la réputation de la maison von Valancius, raison pour laquelle il était exclu que mon géniteur me reconnaisse officiellement. »
languages.original_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'avais été un enfant légitime, alors oui, on aurait placardé mon nom en lettres d'or dans les chroniques de la dynastie. Cependant, l'origine de ma mère, entre autres circonstances, aurait terni la réputation de la maison von Valancius, raison pour laquelle il était exclu que mon géniteur me reconnaisse officiellement. »

languages.text: "Meşru bir çocuk olsaydım adımı hanedanlık vakayinamesine altın harflerle yazarlardı. Ancak annemin kökeni ve birtakım başka koşullar, von Valancius Hanesi'ne zarar veriyordu. Bu yüzden aileye dâhil oluşum konusunda sorun yaşandı."
languages.original_text: "Had I been a legitimate child — yes, they would have written my name in gold into the dynasty's chronicle. However, my mother's origin as well as certain other circumstances were damaging for House von Valancius, and so, my inclusion into the family hit a snag."

traits.locale_text: "Meşru bir çocuk olsaydım adımı hanedanlık vakayinamesine altın harflerle yazarlardı. Ancak annemin kökeni ve birtakım başka koşullar, von Valancius Hanesi'ne zarar veriyordu. Bu yüzden aileye dâhil oluşum konusunda sorun yaşandı."
